source: Claude Code MCP session with live Krisp Core account

tools.name: mcp__krisp__date_time
tools.description: Get current date/time or enumerate dates in a range. Use this for accurate time-based reasoning.

start_date.description: Start date for range enumeration (inclusive). Accepts ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2024-01-15") or common formats like "15/01/2024". If provided, end_date is also required.

end_date.description: End date for range enumeration (inclusive). Accepts ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2024-01-20") or common formats like "20/01/2024". If provided, start_date is also required.

tools.name: mcp__krisp__get_document
tools.description: Fetch any document by its ID.

tools.name: mcp__krisp__get_multiple_documents
tools.description: Fetch multiple documents by their IDs in a single request (2-10 documents).

tools.name: mcp__krisp__list_activities
tools.description: List activities from the Activity Center.

timestamp.description: Pagination cursor - pass the created_at of the last activity to get more results

tools.name: mcp__krisp__list_upcoming_meetings
tools.description: List upcoming calendar meetings for the next few days.

tools.name: mcp__krisp__search_meetings
tools.description: Search meetings by text query or retrieve by ID.

id.description: Meeting ID(s) for direct lookup. When provided, search is ignored.

search.description: Search query to find meetings by name, content, attendees, or topics discussed.

fields.description: Fields to include in response. If not specified, all fields are returned.

after.description: Filter meetings after this date (inclusive). ISO 8601.

before.description: Filter meetings before this date (inclusive). ISO 8601.
